The Twitter handle: NitaAmabani, which posted the claim, was created in September last year and has over 17,000 followers with 'Reliance Group' mentioned in the bio.
The tweet claiming that Reliance gifted: कट्टर मोदी समर्थक ग्रुप से जुड़ते ही अपने 51 साथियो को भी जोड़े', which had been shared more than 500 times at the time of writing.
Alt News performed a keyword search and: but there were no reports of the Reliance Group making a donation.
Nita Ambani does not have a Twitter acco: and the handle @NitaAmabani is a fake account created in her name. The account is not verified and has posted several political tweets targeting leaders like Rahul Gandhi and Akhilesh Yadav, which would not go unnoticed if made by a well-known public figure like Nita Ambani.
